00114             function                process_group_list( $Options , $ProcessingString , $Changed )
00115             {
00116                   try
00117                   {
00118                         /* printing list of all available groups */
00119                         if( strpos( $ProcessingString , '{group_list}' ) !== false )
00120                         {
00121                               $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00122                               $Items = $this->Database->select( 'title' , '`umx_group`' , '1' );
00123                               $c = count( $Items );
00124                               $AllGroups = '';
00125                               foreach( $Items as $k => $i )
00126                               {
00127                                     $AllGroups .= $i->title;
00128                                     if( $k + 1 != $c )
00129                                     {
00130                                           $AllGroups .= ', ';
00131                                     }
00132                               }
00133                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( '{group_list}' , $AllGroups , $ProcessingString );
00134                         }
00135                         
00136                         return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
00137                   }
00138                   catch( Exception $e )
00139                   {
00140                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00141                   }
00142             }

00174             function                process_group_list_for_object( $Options , $Str , $Changed )
00175             {
00176                   try
00177                   {
00178                         $Rules = array( 'object' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'type' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00179                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'group_list_for_object' , $Rules ) ; )
00180                         {
00181                               $GroupList = '';
00182                               
00183                               if( $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_permit( false , 'user' , 'permit_manager' ) )
00184                               {
00185                                     $this->Settings->load_settings( $Params );
00186                                     
00187                                     list( $Object , $Type ) = $this->Settings->get_settings( 'object,type' , 'public,' );
00188                                     
00189                                     $GroupList = $this->GroupAccess->get_groups_for_object( $Object , $Type );
00190                                     sort( $GroupList );
00191                                     $GroupList = implode( ', ' , $GroupList );
00192                               }
00193                               
00194                               $Str = str_replace( "{group_list_for_object:$Params}" , $GroupList , $Str );
00195                               $Changed = true;
00196                         }
00197                         
00198                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00199                   }
00200                   catch( Exception $e )
00201                   {
00202                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00203                   }
00204             }

00236             function                process_group_list_widget( $Options , $Str , $Changed )
00237             {
00238                   try
00239                   {
00240                         $Rules = array( 'object_groups' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00241                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'group_list_widget' , $Rules ) ; )
00242                         {
00243                               if( $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_permit( false , 'user' , 'permit_manager' ) )
00244                               {
00245                                     $this->Settings->load_settings( $Params );
00246                                     
00247                                     $AllGroupList = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'all' , '' );
00248                                     if( strlen( $AllGroupList ) == 0 )
00249                                     {
00250                                           $AllGroupList = array();
00251                                     }
00252                                     else
00253                                     {
00254                                           $AllGroupList = explode( ', ' , $AllGroupList );
00255                                     }
00256                                     
00257                                     $ObjectGroupList = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'object_groups' , 'public' );
00258                                     if( strlen( $ObjectGroupList ) == 0 )
00259                                     {
00260                                           $ObjectGroupList = array();
00261                                     }
00262                                     else
00263                                     {
00264                                           $ObjectGroupList = explode( ', ' , $ObjectGroupList );
00265                                     }
00266                                     
00267                                     $CachedFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00268                                     $GroupListWidget = $CachedFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'group_list.tpl' );
00269                                     $GroupListWidget = str_replace( 
00270                                           '{object}' , $this->Settings->get_setting( 'object' ) , $GroupListWidget
00271                                     );
00272                                     
00273                                     sort( $ObjectGroupList );
00274                                     foreach( $ObjectGroupList as $key => $p )
00275                                     {
00276                                           $GroupListWidget = str_replace( 
00277                                                 '{object_groups}' , 
00278                                                 "<div class='double_panel_row no_selection_text' id='$p"."_div_id'><input type=".
00279                                                       "'hidden' id='".$p."_field_id' name='groups[]' value='$p'><a ".
00280                                                       "href=\"javascript:DeleteGroup( '$p' );\">$p</a><br></div>{object_groups}" , 
00281                                                       $GroupListWidget
00282                                           );
00283                                     }
00284                                     
00285                                     sort( $AllGroupList );
00286                                     foreach( $AllGroupList as $key => $p )
00287                                     {
00288                                           if( in_array( $p , $ObjectGroupList ) === false )
00289                                           {
00290                                                 $GroupListWidget = str_replace( 
00291                                                       '{rest_groups}' , 
00292                                                       "<div class='double_panel_row no_selection_text' id='".$p.
00293                                                             "_div_id_rest'><a href=\"javascript:AddGroup( '$p' );\">$p</a><br>".
00294                                                             "</div>{rest_groups}" , 
00295                                                       $GroupListWidget 
00296                                                 );
00297                                           }
00298                                     }
00299                               }
00300                               else
00301                               {
00302                                     $GroupListWidget = '';
00303                               }
00304                               
00305                               $Str = str_replace( "{group_list_widget:$Params}" , $GroupListWidget , $Str );
00306 
00307                               $Changed = true;
00308                         }
00309                         
00310                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00311                   }
00312                   catch( Exception $e )
00313                   {
00314                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00315                   }
00316             }

00336             function                get_controller()
00337             {
00338                   try
00339                   {
00340                         $Code = '';
00341                         
00342                         if( $this->ControllerWasAdded === false )
00343                         {
00344                               $Code = '{direct_controller:set_group=1;delete_group=1;toggle_group=1;'.
00345                                           'package_name=permit::permit_controller}';
00346                               
00347                               $this->ControllerWasAdded = true;
00348                         }
00349                         
00350                         return( $Code );
00351                   }
00352                   catch( Exception $e )
00353                   {
00354                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00355                   }
00356             }

00388             function                process_set_group_button( $Options , $Str , $Changed )
00389             {
00390                   try
00391                   {
00392                         $Rules = array( 
00393                               'group' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'master_id' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'master_type' => TERMINAL_VALUE
00394                         );
00395                         
00396                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'toggle_group_button' , $Rules ) ; )
00397                         {
00398                               $this->Settings->load_settings( $Params );
00399                               
00400                               list( $Text , $Group , $MasterId ) = $this->Settings->get_settings( 'text,group,master_id' );
00401                               $MasterType = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'master_type' , 'user' );
00402                               $CheckBoxes = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'checkboxes' , 'user' );
00403                               
00404                               $Code = $this->get_controller();
00405                               $Code .= "{href:text=$Text;page=javascript:ultimix.permit.SetGroupButton".
00406                                     "( '$Group' , $MasterId , '$MasterType' , '$CheckBoxes' )}";
00407                               
00408                               $Str = str_replace( "{set_group_button:$Params}" , $Code , $Str );
00409                               $Changed = true;
00410                         }
00411                         
00412                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00413                   }
00414                   catch( Exception $e )
00415                   {
00416                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00417                   }
00418             }

00574             function                process_group_select( $Options , $Str , $Changed )
00575             {
00576                   try
00577                   {
00578                         $Rules = array( 'name' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00579                         
00580                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'group_select' , $Rules ) ; )
00581                         {
00582                               $this->Settings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00583                               
00584                               list( $Name , $Class ) = $this->Settings->get_settings( 'name,class',  'group,flat width_160' );
00585                                                             
00586                               $Code = "{select:name=$Name;class=$Class;".
00587                                           "query=SELECT id , title AS value FROM `umx_group` ORDER BY title}";
00588                               
00589                               $Str = str_replace( "{group_select:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
00590                               $Changed = true;
00591                         }
00592                         
00593                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00594                   }
00595                   catch( Exception $e )
00596                   {
00597                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00598                   }
00599             }

00631             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00632             {
00633                   try
00634                   {
00635                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_group_list( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00636 
00637                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_group_list_for_object( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00638 
00639                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_group_list_widget( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00640                         
00641                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_set_group_button( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00642                         
00643                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_delete_group_button( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00644                         
00645                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_toggle_group_button( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00646                         
00647                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_group_select( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00648                         
00649                         return( $Str );
00650                   }
00651                   catch( Exception $e )
00652                   {
00653                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00654                   }
00655             }
